product.title: KISS Instawave 101 Automatic Rotating Curling Iron, 1.25” Pearl Ceramic Tourmaline Barrel
product.description: The new KISS Instawave 101 is the most affordable automatic curling Iron that creates beautiful salon quality curls at the push of a button. This fool-proof auto curler creates tight curls to loose beach waves in minutes. The directional switch creates curls facing inward or outward for a more natural look. Place a 1" section of hair between the prongs and push the button the way you want the curl to face. With patented tangle free technology.
product.description_html: The new KISS Instawave 101 is the most affordable automatic curling Iron that creates beautiful salon quality curls at the push of a button. This fool-proof auto curler creates tight curls to loose beach waves in minutes.  The directional switch creates curls facing inward or outward for a more natural look. Place a 1" section of hair between the prongs and push the button the way you want the curl to face. With patented tangle free technology.
product.description_full:
The new KISS Instawave 101 is the most affordable automatic curling Iron that creates beautiful salon quality curls at the push of a button. This fool-proof auto curler creates tight curls to loose beach waves in minutes. The directional switch creates curls facing inward or outward for a more natural look. Place a 1" section of hair between the prongs and push the button the way you want the curl to face. With patented tangle free technology. * The barrel rotates to curl hair automatically
 * Patented tangle-free technology.
 * 1.25” Pearl Ceramic Tourmaline Barrel
 * Fast heat up to 400° with a cool safety tip
 * Also available in a 1" barrel for a variety of curls and hair lengths
product.description_full_html:
The new KISS Instawave 101 is the most affordable automatic curling Iron that creates beautiful salon quality curls at the push of a button. This fool-proof auto curler creates tight curls to loose beach waves in minutes. The directional switch creates curls facing inward or outward for a more natural look. Place a 1" section of hair between the prongs and push the button the way you want the curl to face. With patented tangle free technology.
  • The barrel rotates to curl hair automatically
  • Patented tangle-free technology.
  • 1.25” Pearl Ceramic Tourmaline Barrel
  • Fast heat up to 400° with a cool safety tip
  • Also available in a 1" barrel for a variety of curls and hair lengths

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
